021import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.NoValidCurrenciesException;
022
023import java.io.File;
024
025/**
026 * Used to load currencies.
027 *
028 * @author creatorfromhell
029 * @see Currency
030 * @since 0.1.2.0
031 */
032public interface CurrencyLoader {
033
034  /**
035   * Loads all currencies.
036   *
037   * @param directory The directory to load the currencies from.
038   *
039   * @throws NoValidCurrenciesException When no valid currencies can be loaded.
040   */
041  void loadCurrencies(final File directory) throws NoValidCurrenciesException;
042
043  /**
044   * Loads a specific currency.
045   *
046   * @param directory The directory to load the currency from.
047   * @param name      The name of the currency to load.
048   */
049  boolean loadCurrency(final File directory, final String name);
050
051  /**
052   * Loads a specific currency.
053   *
054   * @param directory    The directory to load the currency from.
055   * @param curDirectory The file of the currency
056   */
057  boolean loadCurrency(final File directory, final File curDirectory);
058
059  /**
060   * Loads all denominations for a currency.
061   *
062   * @param directory The directory to load the denominations from.
063   * @param currency  The currency of the denomination.
064   */
065  boolean loadDenominations(final File directory, Currency currency);
066
067  /**
068   * Loads all denominations for a currency.
069   *
070   * @param directory The directory to load the denomination from.
071   * @param currency  The currency of the denomination.
072   * @param name      The name of the denomination to load.
073   */
074  boolean loadDenomination(final File directory, Currency currency, final String name);
075
076  /**
077   * Loads all denominations for a currency.
078   *
079   * @param currency  The currency of the denomination.
080   * @param denomFile The file of the denomination to load.
081   */
082  boolean loadDenomination(Currency currency, final File denomFile);
083}
